nodes.text: The Phantom Menace - The Film Novel

The Phantom Menace - The Film Novel (French: La Menace fantôme - Le roman du film) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The Phantom Menace - The Film Novel was written by Lucile Galliot and published by Hachette Jeunesse on January 20, 2016.

Before he became a famous Jedi Knight, and long before he revealed himself as the darkest soul in the galaxy, Anakin Skywalker was a young slave on the planet Tatooine. The Force is already strong in him and he is a remarkable Podracer pilot. Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn discovers him and sees his immense potential.
Meanwhile, the insatiable Trade Federation droid army has invaded peaceful Naboo as part of a secret Sith plan to increase their power. To defend the Queen of Naboo, Amidala, the Jedi Knights must confront the dreaded Sith Lord, Darth Maul.
